result.eng: Have you any news? - Indeed I haven't.
result.ga: an bhfuil nuacht ar bith agat - muise níl
result.orig: An bhfuil nuacht ar bith agat - Muise níl
result.html: an bhfuil nuacht ar bith agat - muise nílHave you any news? - Indeed I haven't.
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil nuaċt ar biṫ agat - muise nílHave you any news? - Indeed I haven't.

result.eng: Well, you'll be made a saint one day!
result.ga: muise déanfar naomh díot go fóill
result.orig: Muise déanfar naomh díot go fóill
result.html: muise déanfar naomh díot go fóillWell, you'll be made a saint one day!
